content:
advertisement

Travis Salters was looking forward to filling out the census until he reached question nine PERIOD

Asked about his ethnicity Salters who is both black and white was more than willing to give out his information PERIOD But no  option was given  just a box to label himself as  and another box to label himself as 

 Salters sophomorebroadcast journalism and African and AfricanAmerican studies said PERIOD 

Salters is not the only student who felt confused when it came to filling out the parts of the census concerning race and ethnicity PERIOD

For Angelica Garcia it was dj vu PERIOD When she was admitted to Mount Nittany Medical Center six months ago to give birth to her son she was told to label herself as  on medical forms since  was not an option PERIOD

Now Garcia seniorhotel restaurant and institutional management said she struggled to figure out what boxes to check for her baby who is of mixed Mexican and black descent PERIOD She had her own question Why isnt  an option

MexicanAmerican Student Association President Berenice Bedolla said the issue of being mixed was also brought up at a recent Latino Caucus meeting PERIOD The discussion got so heated that a student said he might not fill the census out PERIOD

 Bedolla juniorhotel restaurant and institutional management said PERIOD 

The use of the word  on the census is also raising eyebrows PERIOD

Kirin Kennedy who serves as a Pennsylvania Apprentice to the League of Young Voters Education Fund said the word is still in use because more than  people personally wrote in the word  as their race in the last census PERIOD

While the majority of people who wrote in Negro were older citizens Kennedy seniorgeography said she could see how some people would not identify with that word today PERIOD

 Kennedy said PERIOD

Census Bureau Media Specialist Pamela Golden said since the census first began in  it  and data the government collects from each census PERIOD

Several years of research go into forming each census Golden said PERIOD

Salters thinks its time to make a change PERIOD

 Salters said PERIOD
